Test Name: HLA Class I (ABC) Multiple and Single Locus Typing by DNA-PCR and Next Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Purpose: To perform HLA Class I (ABC) multiple and single locus typing using DNA-PCR and NGS for accurate, reliable clinical and research results.
Container: EDTA or Acid Citrate Dextrose (ACD) blood collection tube
Equipment: DNA isolation kit, thermal cycler, NGS platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), nucleic acid quantification device (e.g., Qubit or NanoDrop)
